heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Defence Act 2023 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Defence Act 2023 (Commencement) 

Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil defence act 2023 (commencement) order 2023

title: conferred on me by section 15(2) of the Civil Defence Act 2023 (No. 17 of
heading: 2. The 18th day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Civil
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Civil 

Defence Act 2023 (No. 17 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 July, 2023. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Minister for Defence. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [363] 3
